tvdb: Before leaving to see Jamal, Alison slips on a patch of ice, is knocked unconscious and taken to the hospital.  In Chicago, Jamal and Ricky argue about Gabriela donating her kidney to Hope, but Gabriela makes it clear it's her decision to make.  Ali calls Jamal, but he abruptly hangs up on her.  Rafe pleads with Ed to return him to Earth to fix Ali and Jamal's relationship.  Julie says a tearful goodbye to Christina before handing her over to Lucy for good.  Julie then says a poignant goodbye to Chris too.  Lucy and Kevin take Christina home, where Scott confronts and asks why he wasn't informed about Christina.
